decimals.description: number of decimal places of the supply token, needed for proper curve math. If it is eg. BTC, where a balance of 10^8 means 1 BTC, then use 8 here.

reserve_decimals.description: number of decimal places for the reserve token, needed for proper curve math. Same format as decimals above, eg. if it is uatom, where 1 unit is 10^-6 ATOM, use 6 here

reserve_denom.description: this is the reserve token denom (only support native for now)

symbol.description: symbol / ticker of the supply token
